text: Ej farzandoni Odam, hamono ʙaroi şumo liʙose firistodem, to şarmgohatonro ʙipūşad va in liʙos zarurī ast va niz liʙosi zinnatro, ki in liʙosi kamoli ne'mat ast. Va liʙosi parhezgorī, ki in ʙa ço ovardani amrhoi Alloh va dur ʙudan az man'kardahoi Ūst va on ʙehtarin liʙos ast ʙaroi mū'min. Va in jake az ojoti Alloh ast, ʙoşad, ki pand girand
